summary: A test suite that verifies the functionality of a supervised fine‑tuning trainer under a wide range of configurations, including PEFT adapters, different model string specifications, standard Transformers integration, multi‑process execution, gradient checkpointing, device‑map handling, QLoRA quantization, chat‑format data, and Liger extensions.
business_intent: Guarantee the robustness and correctness of the SFT training pipeline before deployment, reducing regression risk and ensuring compatibility with various optimization and scaling techniques.
